text:
#sandbox
Please everyone, can we upvote this idea so they have to overwhelmingly implement this feature? 

This request deals with using a Sandbox account for a client to develop and allow you to commit changes to the production environment. Without this, we are doing double work, with loss of time for deadlines, and a hirer chance of error trying to implement changes made in the Sandbox.

Hereâ€™s the link to UPVOTE: <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Ability-to-choose-sync-direction-between-HubSpot-Sandboxes-and/idi-p/542037/highlight/true|https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Ability-to-choose-sync-direction-between-HubSpot-Sandboxes-and/idi-p/542037/highlight/true>
<@U03MPE6V73M>  is this in the product pipeline?
